name: Beefed Up Shish Kebabs
description: A great choice for potlucks! Choose top sirloin—it cooks quickly at hot temperatures while staying juicy and flavourful, and it doesn’t break the bank.

ingredients.name: Shish Kebab Seasoning or Montreal Steak Rub

preparation: Preheat grill to medium-high. Lightly brush with oil.

Chop steak, peppers, and onion into 1" pieces. Place steak pieces in a large bowl and toss with seasoning and 1 tbsp oil. Add chopped veggies and mushrooms to bowl and drizzle with remaining oil. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
Thread onto Grill Boss Skewers. Grill skewers with lid closed, 2–4 min per side, until lightly charred and steak is cooked to your liking.
If you have time, let kebabs rest 5 min before serving. Serve with sauce, if desired.
tips: For more robust flavour, marinate seasoned steak overnight.
